metadata.description: The prefix to use on resources inside this template
Optional: The location the private cloud should be deployed to, by default this will be the location of the deployment
The address space used for the AVS Private Cloud management networks. Must be a non-overlapping /22
The SKU that should be used for the first cluster, ensure you have quota for the given SKU before deploying
Optional: Connectivity to Internet through Managed SNAT Service
The number of nodes to be deployed in the first/default cluster, ensure you have quota before deploying
Optional: Assign Jumpbox VM as Contributor on AVS Private Cloud

The address space used for the VNet attached to AVS. Must be non-overlapping with existing networks
The subnet CIDR used for the Gateway Subnet. Must be a /24 or greater within the VNetAddressSpace
Email addresses to be added to the alerting action group. Use the format ["name1@domain.com","name2@domain.com"].
Should a Jumpbox & Bastion be deployed to access the Private Cloud
Username for the Jumpbox VM
Password for the Jumpbox VM, can be changed later

The sku to use for the Jumpbox VM, must have quota for this within the target region
The OS Version for the Jumpbox VM. By default, it is Microsoft Windows Server 2012 Azure Edition with small disk for storage to reduce costs.

Should run a bootstrap PowerShell script on the Jumpbox VM or not
The path for Jumpbox VM bootstrap PowerShell script file (expecting "bootstrap.ps1" file)
The command to trigger running the bootstrap script. If was not provided, then the expected script file name must be "bootstrap.ps1")
The subnet CIDR used for the Bastion Subnet. Must be a /26 or greater within the VNetAddressSpace
